00015 
00016 CWorldMap::CWorldMap(CExeFile &ExeFile):
00017 m_active(false),
00018 m_ExeFile(ExeFile)
00019 {}
00020 
00021 bool CWorldMap::isActive()
00022 { return m_active; }
00023 
00024 void CWorldMap::setActive(bool value)
00025 {
00026  m_active = value;
00027  if(m_active)
00028  {
00029   m_Map.drawAll();
00030   m_Map.setScrollSurface(g_pVideoDriver->getScrollSurface());
00031      // Set Scrollbuffer
00032      g_pVideoDriver->setScrollBuffer(&m_Map.m_scrollx_buf, &m_Map.m_scrolly_buf);
00033  }
00034 }
00035 
00036 void CWorldMap::init()
00037 {
00038  // Load the World map level.
00039  CMapLoaderGalaxy MapLoader(m_ExeFile, m_ObjectPtr);
00040 
00041  m_Map.setScrollSurface(g_pVideoDriver->getScrollSurface());
00042  MapLoader.loadMap(m_Map, 0); // Map Level?
00043 
00044  m_Map.drawAll();
00045 }
00046 
00047 void CWorldMap::process()
00048 {
00049  // Animate the tiles of the map
00050  m_Map.animateAllTiles();
00051 
00052  for(size_t i=0 ; i<m_ObjectPtr.size() ; i++)
00053  {
00054   CObject* p_Object = m_ObjectPtr[i];
00055 
00056   p_Object->process();
00057  }
00058 
00059  g_pVideoDriver->blitScrollSurface();
00060 
00061  for( std::vector<CObject*>::iterator obj=m_ObjectPtr.begin() ;
00062    obj!=m_ObjectPtr.end() ; obj++ )
00063  {
00064   (*obj)->draw();
00065  }
00066 
00067  // Draw masked tiles here!
00068  m_Map.drawForegroundTiles();
00069 }
00070 
00071 
00072 CWorldMap::~CWorldMap() {
00073  while(!m_ObjectPtr.empty())
00074  {
00075   delete m_ObjectPtr.back();
00076   m_ObjectPtr.pop_back();
00077  }
00078 }

00080 }
